item.title: Breaking Into a Career in Tech I: How I found work that I love
item.description: Part I: Deciding A bit of context in media res Date: October 28, 2021. As someone that ended up in a fulfilling career at an early age, Many people close to me have asked for advice on how to find work they love and be effective doing it. The problem is, I don’t have the answers. But rather than just shrug and say “I don’t know”, I let people pick my brain.
